text: Bernard Lewis, FBA (May 31, 1916 - May 19, 2018) was a British-American historian. He worked in the oriental studies. He was also known as a public intellectual and political commentator. Lewis died on May 19, 2018, at the age of 101, in Voorhees Township, New Jersey twelve days before his 102nd birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lewis's Princeton University homepage * The ASMEA Website * Atlantic Monthly: "The Roots of Muslim Rage" * Revered and Reviled - Moment Magazine profile of Bernard Lewis * Interview with Bernard Lewis at National Review Online Category:1916 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American historians Category:English centenarians Category:English historians Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Writers from London
